document_data.name: Orcskull Rise
document_data.mainbody: '''Orcskull Rise''' was a ridge located along the [[Trade Way]] between [[Scornubel]] and [[Triel]].
document_data.Geography: Orcskull Rise was a rocky ridge, where a mining trail crossed the [[Trade Way]]. It was surrounded by hills, along one of which the aforementioned mining trail stretched.
document_data.History:
[[Orthil Voldovan]]'s caravan stopped by Orcskull Rise, using the ridge for protection, along its passage between [[Scornubel]] and [[Triel]] in late {{yearlink|1357}}.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|173|11}}{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|137|9}}

[[Belgon Bradaskor]] informed [[Sharantyr]], when she sought information on how to catch up with the caravan, that Orcskull Rise was a likely stop for Orthil.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|127|8}}
